Title: Angular Jobs
Notes: No RSS feed for jobs available

Title: Authentic Jobs
Notes: Custom filters can be created for freelance/contract/remote and other parameters

Title: Behance
Notes: No RSS feed but you can subscribe to email

Title: ClojureJobboard.com
Notes: Clojure jobs only with a remote section

Title: Coroflot
Notes: Presented as Design Jobs but there are development/technical positions within this category

Title: Craigs List
Notes: Exact URL will depend on city/location you want to search within and should be formatted like: https://[city].craigslist.org/search/web?format=rss

Title: Cryptocurrency Jobs
Notes: Also on Twitter (@jobsincrypto)

Title: CyberCoders
Notes: No RSS feed but can sign up for emails

Title: DailyRemote
Notes: No RSS feed but can sign up for job alerts and also on Twitter(@daily_remote)

Title: Dribbble
Notes: Mostly design and UI/UX jobs but also some development

Title: Edworking
Notes: One platform for you and your team

Title: F6s
Notes: No RSS feed but you can create an account and receive notifications

Title: Find Bacon
Notes: Also on Twitter (@findbacon)

Title: Flex Jobs
Notes: No RSS feed for job postings

Title: FOSS Jobs
Notes: Jobs for FOSS and Open Hardware. A list of category-specific feeds can be found here: https://www.fossjobs.net/rss/

Title: FreshRemote.work
Notes: Fresh remote jobs anywhere (tech + non-tech)

Title: Functional Jobs
Notes: Functional programming jobs

Title: GIIN
Notes: Global Impact Investing Network

Title: Glassdoor
Notes: No RSS feeds but you can create job alerts with an account

Title: Golang / Go Jobs
Notes: Jobs for Goland/Go developers

Title: Golang Remote Jobs
Notes: Remote Jobs for Go/Golang Developers

Title: Hacker News Jobs
Notes: No RSS feed for jobs but there is an API which would theoretically allow you to build one: https://github.com/HackerNews/API

Title: HasJob
Notes: The have an Anywhere option under the location filter. Feed not filterable. Also on Twitter (@hasjob)

Title: HigherEd Jobs
Notes: They have an Online/Remote Job section

Title: Himalayas
Notes: Dedicated remote job board

Title: Idealist
Notes: No RSS feed but there is an email subscription available

Title: Indeed
Notes: You can filter more specifically by passing the q parameter like this: http://rss.indeed.com/rss?q=web+development

Title: Jobhunt.ai
Notes: Machine learning and data science jobs with a remote section

Title: JustRemote
Notes: No RSS feed but they do have a mailing list

Title: Landing.jobs
Notes: Other parameters can be passed to further filter job results

Title: LinkedIn
Notes: No RSS feeds but you can create job alerts with an account.You must provide a search term to see job listings. Most (all?) jobs require a LinkedIn account to apply

Title: Mashable Jobs
Notes: You can filter more specifically by passing parameters but it's easiest to filter the results to your liking on the page and copy the update RSS feed link

Title: NODESK
Notes: On Twitter (@nodeskco)

Title: NTEN
Notes: Nonprofit Technology Network

Title: Outsourcely
Notes: No RSS feed but you can create an account and receive notifications

Title: PowerToFly
Notes: No RSS feed. Focused on working with companies emphasizing diversity in hiring. Women helping women elevate their careers

Title: Product Hunt Jobs
Notes: No RSS feed but there is a GraphQL endpoint that might be leveraged to create your own: https://www.producthunt.com/frontend/graphql

Title: Python Jobs
Notes: Unclear if the RSS feed is filterable to only show remote work

Title: React Jobs
Notes: No RSS feed but there is a Twitter account (@react_jobs)

Title: Remote Backend Jobs
Notes: https://twitter.com/remotebackends

Title: Remote Frontend Jobs
Notes: https://twitter.com/remotefrontends

Title: Remotesome
Notes: High rate of employment for vetted talent + public job postings coming 3/21

Title: Ruby Now
Notes: No RSS feed

Title: SkipeTheDrive
Notes: No RSS feed but there is an email subscription available

Title: TechMeAbroad
Notes: No RSS feed but they have a Twitter account (@techmeabroad)

Title: Virtual Vocations
Notes: Variety of remote work beyond developer jobs

Title: We Work Remotely
Notes: You can filter by more specific categories using the RSS URLs listed on this page: https://weworkremotely.com/remote-job-rss-feed

Title: WeJob
Notes: Nope but we're on Twitter(@WeJobCH) and Telegram(@wejobch)

Title: WordPress Jobs
Notes: You can filter by category by using the category-specific RSS feeds from the frontpage. They look like this: https://jobs.wordpress.net/job_category/development/feed/

Title: Working Nomads
Notes: The feed is a JSON feed

Title: ZipRecruiter
Notes: No RSS feed but you can create an account and receive notifications

Title: Remotetify Jobs
Notes: The best curated remote jobs for those looking to start a telecommuting career
